thread.title: Erykah Badu's Remix of Drake's "Hotline Bling" Is Better Than the Original
thread.title_full: Erykah Badu's Remix of Drake's "Hotline Bling" Is Better Than the Original | Maxim

author: Kelly McClure
title: Erykah Badu's Remix of Drake's "Hotline Bling" Is Better Than the Original
text:
Lay back, close your eyes, and take some deep healing breaths. Focus on the dark shades of your eyelids until the black turns to red, and then a pulsating orange. Let your body relax and your mind sink deeper, and deeper, and deeper. Now focus on the time when Drake met with Erykah Badu in her home for tea . Because that's a thing that happened during our collective lifetimes, and that makes everything worthwhile.
One of the coolest humans on the planet, Erykah Badu , has released a seven minute remix of Drake's " Hotline Bling " and it is truly something special. Give yourself a rim shot (hey, digi digi) and enjoy the next seven minutes of your life listening to this.
The remix is from Badu's forthcoming mixtape , BUT YOU CAINT USE MY PHONE, which can't get here fast enough.
